content:
Strange: Commits to my contrib theme https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/editorial are made by the Github user Olaf Grabienski and don't appear as activity on https://github.com/olafgrabienski. In contrast, commits to https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/tocbot are made by olafgrabienski and appear on the mentioned page. Does anyone know how to change the Github user for the theme?

backdrop-contrib/editorial
A magazine-like Backdrop theme. Contribute to backdrop-contrib/editorial development by creating an account on GitHub.
olafgrabienski - Overview
olafgrabienski has 4 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.
backdrop-contrib/tocbot
Builds a table of contents (TOC) from content headings. - backdrop-contrib/tocbot
Take a look at the email addresses related to your Github account. You might have done commit with a different email setting (git config)
Ah, I see, thank you! Changed the mail address now. (I guess it won't affect former commits.)
Github allows additional email addresses, too. (Somewhere in the settings... don't remember right now)
Yes, just found it and added the other address with which I've made the theme commits. Seems to have picked it up, great!
